title.rendered: How to watch Vodafone TV using Chromecast

content.rendered:
If you are a Vodafone customer subscribed to its television pack, you may not know that for some time it has been possible to send your content to Chromecast to watch it more comfortably on other devices. Google dongle is compatible with Vodafone TV and we are going to tell you how you can watch the operator’s television through this gadget.

The process is really simple and will be familiar to you if you are used to sending content to your TV via Chromecast. Be that as it may, these are the steps to start watching Vodafone TV using Chromecast.

Previous steps to use Vodafone TV

With Chromecast you send Vodafone TV content directly to your television using the Vodafone TV App. Therefore, the first step will be to download the application from the App Store or from the Google Play Store, or update if we do not have the latest version available in case there has been a correction and in this way you can test the functionality in the best possible conditions. .

Vodafone TV

This function has been available in the app for some time. In the case of iOS from version 3.0.0 (it is currently at version 6.0.94) and in the case of Android from version 3.0.1 (it is also currently at 6.0.94). In both cases, Chromecast support is enabled by default.

 

The next thing you will need is to create a user account, a profile on the Vodafone platform. To do this, follow these steps:

  1. Access the My Vodafone App from your mobile or your private My Vodafone area.
  2. In the menu of your mobile, go to “My products” > “Products and services” and select the “Television” service or, in your computer, to “What you have contracted” > “Television” > “Multi-device TV”.
  3. Click on “Manage your device” on your mobile or on “Activate now” on your computer.
  4. Enter an e-mail (it asks you twice) and click on “Activate”.
  5. You receive an e-mail in your inbox that confirms the activation and asks you to set a password (if you don’t receive it within 1 hour, check your spam box).
  6. Once your account is created, you have to download the app on your devices if you haven’t already done so.

How to watch on Chromecast

Once we have everything in order, the following will be the process to send the contents to the screen where the Chromecast is connected. Remember that to use Vodafone TV with your Chromecast you must have previously configured the latter through the Google Home app.

Chromecast Vodafone TV

Likewise, both the Chromecast and the device where you have the app installed must be connected to the same WiFi network and that the Chromecast is also turned on and correctly plugged into an HDMI port on the television. This is basic to be able to start with the pairing of the devices.

If everything is correct, you will see that the Chromecast icon appears in the upper right part of your app. Pressing the Chromecast icon will open a window telling you that a new device has been found. If more than one appears, select only the Chromecast to which you want to cast the content to watch Vodafone TV on it. In a few seconds we will have the content on our television with Chromecast and it will be enough to change the channel with the mobile or select other content on demand.

You can enjoy Vodafone television on your Chromecast with a wide variety of rates. Whether you have one of the Vodafone One Unlimited Rates, or if you have the Total Unlimited mobile rate, the Seriefans or Familyfans pack will be totally free.
